H0.text: UV light is the main cause of skin cancer when exposure is excessive.

H1.text: LED light is the main cause of skin cancer due to excessive exposure.

H2.text: Fluorescent light is the main cause of skin cancer from excessive exposure.

H3.text: Incandescent light is the main cause of skin cancer when there is excessive exposure.

A4.text: The primary cause of skin cancer is prolonged exposure to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun or tanning devices.

A5.text: BCC and SCC often carry a UV-signature mutation indicating that these cancers are caused by UVB radiation via direct DNA damage.
